00187 SubRouteVector::SubRouteVector()

00191 inline uint32
00192 SubRouteVector::getSize() const
00193 {
00194    return size();
00195 }
00196 
00197 inline float
00198 SubRouteVector::getStartOffset() const
00199 {
00200    return getSubRouteAt(0)->getOrigOffset();
00201 }
00202 
00203 inline uint16
00204 SubRouteVector::getStartOffsetUint16() const
00205 {
00206    return (uint16)( getStartOffset() * float(MAX_UINT16) );
00207 }
00208 
00209 inline float
00210 SubRouteVector::getEndOffset() const
00211 {
00212    return getSubRouteAt( size() - 1 )->getDestOffset();
00213 }
00214 
00215 inline uint16
00216 SubRouteVector::getEndOffsetUint16() const
00217 {
00218    return (uint16)( getEndOffset() * float(MAX_UINT16) );
00219 }
00220 
00221 inline bool
00222 SubRouteVector::getStartDirFromZero() const
00223 {
00224    return MapBits::isNode0( getSubRouteAt(0)->getOrigNodeID());
00225 }
00226 
00227 inline bool
00228 SubRouteVector::getEndDirFromZero() const
00229 {
00230    return MapBits::isNode0( getSubRouteAt( size() - 1 )->getDestNodeID() );
00231 }
00232 
00233 inline uint32
00234 SubRouteVector::getTotalDistanceCm() const
00235 {
00236    return uint32(Connection::distCostToMeters(
00237       double(getSubRouteAt( size() - 1 )->getCostASum()) * 100.0)) ;
00238 }
00239 
00240 inline uint32
00241 SubRouteVector::getTotalTimeSec(bool withDisturbances) const
00242 {
00243    SubRoute* lastSubRoute = getSubRouteAt( size() - 1);
00244    uint32 cost = 0;
00245    if ( withDisturbances ) {
00246       cost = lastSubRoute->getCostCSum();
00247    } else {
00248       cost = lastSubRoute->getCostBSum();
00249    }
00250    return uint32(Connection::timeCostToSec( double(cost) ) );
00251 }

00257 }
